name: 2D Platformer (Finished)
description:
Modification 1 - Overhauled level 1 to require basic game mechanics and problem solving

Modification 2 - Overhauled level 2 to require more advanced mechanics and problem solving

Modification 3 - made level 3 making it a boss fight-esc level with skilled parkour over acid spouts at the end

Modification 4 - modified 2 enemies in level 3 to make a huge boss that will 1 shot you and an smart moving enemy that requires 3 hits to kill
